summary: A platform-specific header file for the Cray UNICOS/mk operating system that defines the operating system name and indicates support for long long integer types. This file is part of Sendmail's cross-platform compatibility layer.

logs.reason: This string defines the operating system name which may appear in logs generated elsewhere in the codebase when identifying the platform.
logs.resolution: This is an informational identifier, not an error, so no resolution is required.
